Header: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg to give away 99% of shares
Content: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg and wife Priscilla Chan are officially parents and pretty generous, too. Zuckerberg and his wife Priscilla Chan say they will give away 99% of their shares in the company to good causes as they announce the birth of their daughter Max. Mark Zuckerberg made the announcement in a letter to Max on his Facebook page. He said they are donating their fortune to the Chan Zuckerberg Initiative because they want to make the world a better place for Max to grow up in.
